actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that the eligibility of unemployed construction workers for emergency unemployment compensation will be determined on the basis of the rate of unemployment in the construction industry.

summary.text: Provides, under the Emergency Unemployment Compensation Act of 1974, that the eligibility of unemployed construction workers for emergency unemployment compensation will be determined on the basis of the rate of unemployment in the construction industry.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the eligibility of unemployed construction workers for emergency unemployment compensation will be determined on the basis of the rate of unemployment in the construction industry.
